aboutme.title: About me
aboutme.text: My journey into the IT world began with a small website for a school project. So I wrote the first few lines of HTML and CSS code. Since I liked how something is created from a few lines of text, I wanted to learn more about it. That's why I decided to do a professional training with practical projects. With the help of the trained staff, I was able to deepen my knowledge and develop my skills in JavaScript, Angular and object-oriented programming. With these techniques, I am now able to set up some projects on my own and in a group. As a motivated junior frontend developer, I would now like to start a new path in my career.

portfolio.subtitle: This page is a sample of my work - please feel free to try them out
portfolio.join: Kanban is a process management tool that helps you organize your tasks and workflows. It is written in Angular with Material Design and Firebase.
portfolio.pokedex: A Pokemondeck based on rest API. In this Pokémon gallery you can look up all the Pokémon or search them by name or their index. It uses the Pokeapi.
portfolio.elpolloloco: Object oriented jump and run game. El Pollo Loco is a fun little jump'n'run game written in JavaScript. Help Pepe find coins and tabasco bottles to fight the crazy hen.
portfolio.kingscup: A multiplayer game with angular and firebase. Kings Cup is a card drinking game in which an action must be taken depending on what card you draw. The goal of Kings Cup is quite simple: drink a lot!
